content.raw:
I’m not 100% clear on why an additional `RequestFeatures` would be needed, but the runtime cost of it should be unnoticeable if the casted entities are being cached.

Either way, this is probably a premature optimization concern. I’d say whenever there’s a need in the future to audit the compilation times, this would be a prime candidate to look at.
